Articles.Content:
Originally built for missions to ferry Kerbals to and from Laythe's surface and space stations, this probe-controlled spacecraft is fully capable of ferrying 4 Kerbals into LKO. It comes with 4 MK-1 Pods, an Aerospike engine and 4 Ramjet engines.

Hotkeys:

1: Toggle Aerospike

2: Toggle Jet engines

3: Toggle ladders

Ascend at 70 degrees until 18,000m then level out to 20 degrees, reducing the pitch to maintain a constant vertical ascent speed. Gain about 2000m/s speed before switching to the liquid engines and switch off the jet engines. Point the nose 45 degrees up and thrust until the desired apoapsis. Then circularize and enjoy!
